advancement.alienevo.code_destruct.title: The Countdown Begins
advancement.alienevo.code_master.title: Some Kind of an Upgrade
advancement.alienevo.discover_ship.title: Crash Course
advancement.alienevo.obtain_core.title: The Core of It All
advancement.alienevo.obtain_scroll.title: Ink of the Ancients
alienevo.alien_desc.1: <Pyronites> are a plasma-based species capable of manipulating fire through pyrokinesis for offensive attacks and swift traversal.
alienevo.alien_desc.10: <Ectonurites> are ghostly, flying aliens who can manipulate their protoplasm to become both intangible and invisible, and possess other entities.
alienevo.alien_desc.11: <Arburian> <Pelarotas> are defensive aliens with armored shells, capable of curling into a ball and rolling at high speeds to crush anything in their path.
alienevo.alien_desc.2: <Vulpimancers> are fierce, blind animals with notable strength. Their sharp claws and heightened senses make them proficient in tracking and hunting.
alienevo.alien_desc.3: <Petrosapiens> are an extremely durable species who use crystallokinesis to form crystalline structures, shapeshift, and even deflect energy.
alienevo.alien_desc.4: <Kinecelerans> are known for their incredible speed, agility, and reflexes. They have precise control over their own friction and momentum.
alienevo.alien_desc.5: The <Galvan> are an amphibious species with tremendous technical intellect, known for creating the most advanced technology in the omniverse.
alienevo.alien_desc.6: <Tetramands> are large, durable, and immensely powerful warriors with an agressive nature, capable of lifting heavy objects and delivering forceful punches.
alienevo.alien_desc.7: <Lepidopterrans> are an insectoid species capable of flying and expelling a variety of different slimes with toxic, adhesive, and flammable capabilities.
alienevo.alien_desc.8: <Piscciss> <Volanns> are an aquatic species with large jaws and an incredible biting force, with the ability to shift between forms for land and water.
alienevo.alien_desc.9: <Galvanic> <Mechamorphs> are a techno-organic species created by the Galvan. Made entirely of nanites, they can merge with and enhance technology.
command.autoadd.alienevo.fail: §e§lWarning: §r§7No empty slots found in any playlist. Replacing alien in playlist 1, slot 1.
command.playlist.alienevo.fail: Invalid input! Playlist and slot must be between 1 and 10.
command.removeall.alienevo.success: §c§lAll Aliens Removed: §r§7Cleared §f%s§7 aliens from all playlists.
command.silcolor.alienevo.fail_color: Invalid hex color. Please use a valid 6-digit hex color (e.g. #FF5733 or FF5733).
command.silcolor.alienevo.fail_player: This command can only be used by players.
desc.alienevo.omnitrix.function.base_for: §9Detransform§f at will, timing out the Omnitrix.
desc.alienevo.omnitrix.function.decouple: Separate the Omnitrix from the user. Allows for customization at the §9Omnitrix Workbench§f.
desc.alienevo.omnitrix.function.failsafe: Prevents death when taking §cfatal§f damage. If §atransformed§f, §cdetransform§f instead. If not, unleash a shockwave and §arecharge§f the Omnitrix.
desc.alienevo.omnitrix.function.quick_ch: Rapidly switch between alien forms without returning to human. Activate with the §9Quick Change Wheel§f keybind.
desc.alienevo.omnitrix.function.remove_c: §cRemove§f the Omnitrix Core to disable self-destruct or swap it with another.
desc.alienevo.omnitrix.function.zero_out: Entering the §eMaster Control code§f will §crevoke Master Control§f and §arestore standard functions§f.
desc.alienevo.omnitrix.open_core: Exposes §9module slots§f, enabling the use of §aequipment modules§f. (Currently unavailable)
desc.alienevo_aliens.1.absorb: Hold to absorb nearby fire sources and charge your Supernova meter.
desc.alienevo_aliens.1.fire_ball: §9Right click §fto shoot a flaming orb that explodes on contact.
desc.alienevo_aliens.1.fire_breath: While §9crouching§f, hold to emit a wide blaze from your mouth, igniting foes and blocks.
desc.alienevo_aliens.1.fire_transport: Transform into fire and launch yourself short distances.
desc.alienevo_aliens.1.surf: In midair, activate to glide on a flame board and traverse terrain quickly.
desc.alienevo_aliens.1.tornado: Create a fire tornado that throws entities into the air and damages them.
desc.alienevo_aliens.10.gas_form: While §9intangible§f and §9flying§f, transform into a cloud of gas to move quickly.
desc.alienevo_aliens.10.intangiblity: Become immune to damage and phase through objects. (Drains energy meter)
desc.alienevo_aliens.10.invisibility: Move completely unseen and avoid enemy detection.
desc.alienevo_aliens.10.possession: While §9intangible§f, possess and take control of another entity.
desc.alienevo_aliens.10.scare: Expose your ghostly tentacles to scare your foes - damaging, weakening, and blinding them.
desc.alienevo_aliens.10.shadow_strike: §9Right Click§f to manifest a shadow form, dashing through entities and dealing damage.
desc.alienevo_aliens.10.strike: Release your tentacles to perform a high-damage piercing strike.
desc.alienevo_aliens.11.assault: §6(Ball Form)§f Hold to automatically target and chain dash attacks through nearby entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.11.ball_form: Curl up into a highly mobile and resistant ball, capable of building continous momentum by rolling. Roll over entities to damage and flatten them.
desc.alienevo_aliens.11.block: Hold to raise your arms and reduce damage from incoming attacks.
desc.alienevo_aliens.11.boost: §6(Ball Form)§f Hold to quickly gain momentum, dealing high damage to entities you roll over.
desc.alienevo_aliens.11.boost_still: §6(Ball Form)§f With low momentum, spin in place to reach high speeds quickly.
desc.alienevo_aliens.11.leap: §6(Ball Form)§f Launch yourself through the air and cover large distances. Bounce upon landing.
desc.alienevo_aliens.11.pickup: §9Crouch§f and activate §6Ball Form§f while nearby entities to transport them. Total HP limit of carried entities: §a40§f.
desc.alienevo_aliens.11.rumble: Leap forward and slam your body into the ground, dealing heavy damage and creating a shockwave on impact.
desc.alienevo_aliens.11.slam: §6(Ball Form)§f Launch into the air and slam the ground with explosive force.
desc.alienevo_aliens.2.bite: Lunge forward and deal damage to entities with a strong chomp.
desc.alienevo_aliens.2.climb: While §9crouching§f, activate to stick to and climb vertical surfaces. §9Look up or down §fwhile attached to move.
desc.alienevo_aliens.2.dig: Quickly mine through a large, 3x3 area using your claws.
desc.alienevo_aliens.2.leap: Launch yourself through the air and cover large distances quickly.
desc.alienevo_aliens.2.quill_barrage: Fires a burst of sharp, fast-moving quills that deal damage.
desc.alienevo_aliens.2.slash: §9Passive§f: Your attacks sweep through multiple entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.3.battle_mode: Transform your hands into a sharp sword and sturdy shield for combat.
desc.alienevo_aliens.3.crystallokinesis: Form crystal structures wherever you are aiming.
desc.alienevo_aliens.3.pillar: Raise a tall pillar beneath your feet and gain higher ground.
desc.alienevo_aliens.3.shards: Hold §9Right Click §fto fire piercing crystal shards. (Drains crystal meter)
desc.alienevo_aliens.3.spikes: Summon sharp spikes in the ground, injuring and trapping entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.3.spikes_circle: While §9crouching§f, activate to raise a defensive burst of spikes, flinging away nearby entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.4.assault: Hold §9Right Click §fto automatically target and strike through nearby entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.4.cyclone: Run in circles, creating a powerful tornado that sweeps up and damages entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.4.slide_kick: Dash through and deal damage to entities with a powerful kick.
desc.alienevo_aliens.4.speed_boost: §9Passive§f: At §9speed 5§f, automatically gain a large speed boost after running for a short time.
desc.alienevo_aliens.4.wall_run: Stick to and climb vertical surfaces quickly. §9Look up or down §fwhile attached to move.
desc.alienevo_aliens.4.water_running: §9Passive§f: At §9speed 2 or higher§f, you can run across water.
desc.alienevo_aliens.5.galvan_armor: Standard jetpack armor worn by Galvan soldiers. Enables flight, night vision, and a defense boost.
desc.alienevo_aliens.5.limbs: A nimble exoskeleton that extends your block and entity reach, while boosting your height and movement speed.
desc.alienevo_aliens.5.suit: An extremely durable, pilotable mech suit with high defense, inspired by the technology of the ancient Machine Gods.
desc.alienevo_aliens.6.block: Hold §9Right Click §fto raise your arms and reduce damage from incoming attacks.
desc.alienevo_aliens.6.boulder: Pick up a massive boulder and launch it at entities with §9Right Click§f.
desc.alienevo_aliens.6.climb: Stick to and climb vertical surfaces. §9Look up or down§f while attached to move.
desc.alienevo_aliens.6.leap: Hold to charge a large jump. §9Crouch§f while falling to do a devastating body slam.
desc.alienevo_aliens.6.slam: Slam the ground beneath you to shatter the earth and deal massive damage.
desc.alienevo_aliens.6.sonic_clap: Clap your hands together with extreme force, creating a shockwave that knocks back entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.6.tornado_hook: Spin to create a powerful whirlwind barrage that damages nearby entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.7.pickup: Lift and carry entities with you during flight.
desc.alienevo_aliens.7.slime_shot: Fire four slime projectiles to create puddles that slow and weaken entities. Can extinguish fire, and is also flammable.
desc.alienevo_aliens.7.slime_spit: Spit a continous stream of sticky slime that slows and damages entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.7.sonar_pulse: Vibrate your tail to reveal the ultrasonic frequencies of nearby entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.7.toxic_gas: Release a cloud of poisonous and nauseating gas that lingers in the air.
desc.alienevo_aliens.8.aqua_jet: §3(In Water)§f While §9sprinting§f, propel yourself through the water, damaging entities you pass through.
desc.alienevo_aliens.8.bite: Lunge forward and deal damage to entities with a strong chomp.
desc.alienevo_aliens.8.climb: §6(On Land)§f Stick to and climb vertical surfaces. §9Look up or down §fwhile attached to move.
desc.alienevo_aliens.8.leap: §6(On Land)§f Launch yourself through the air and cover large distances quickly.
desc.alienevo_aliens.8.slash: §9Right Click§f to strike multiple entities with your sharp claws.
desc.alienevo_aliens.8.tail_whip: §6(On Land)§f Flip forwards, whipping your tail to deal damage and knockback.
desc.alienevo_aliens.8.tidal_wave: §3(In Water)§f Shoot an underwater projectile that pushes away everything in its path.
desc.alienevo_aliens.8.whirlpool: §3(In Water)§f Swim in circles to create a vortex, pulling in and damaging entities.
desc.alienevo_aliens.9.glide: §9Crouch§f in midair to stretch your body and float down from high places.
desc.alienevo_aliens.9.liquid_form: Take the form of a puddle to slip through small spaces and avoid detection.
desc.alienevo_aliens.9.optic_laser: Fire a powerful laser beam from your eye.
desc.alienevo_aliens.9.spike_hands: Grow sharp spikes from your hands, turning them into strong mace-like weapons.
desc.alienevo_aliens.9.stretchy_punch: §9Right Click§f to extend your arm, delivering a powerful punch from far distances.
desc.alienevo_aliens.9.upgrade: Activate while atop compatible tech to merge with and enhance it. §9Works on§f: §eLightning Rod
desc.galvanic_rod.lightning_blast: Hold to shoot a continous blast of electricity.
desc.galvanic_rod.lightning_storm: Summon a storm that rains down multiple lightning bolts in a wide area.
desc.galvanic_rod.lightning_throw: §9Right Click§f to throw a lightning bolt projectile.
desc.galvanic_rod.lightning_wave: Release a sequence of lightning bolts in a wave.
fail.alienevo.machine_scroll: Only a species of extraordinary intellect can decipher the contents of this scroll.
lore.alienevo.machine_stronghold_map: Coordinates to a hidden vault, inscribed by the Priests of the Core.
tooltip.ui.alienevo.alienpoints: Obtain <Alien> <Skill> <Points> by killing mobs. The higher their HP, the more XP is rewarded.
tooltip.ui.alienevo.omnipoints: Obtain 1 <Omnitrix> <Skill> <Point> by leveling any alien to level 10.
upgrade.alienevo.smithing_template_galva: Add iron armor, weapon, or tool
